code: import React from'react';import{NavLink,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./Navigation.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=()=>{const location=useLocation();const navItems=[{path:'/home',label:'Home',icon:'üè†'},{path:'/meal-plan',label:'Meal Plan',icon:'üìã'},{path:'/analytics',label:'Analytics',icon:'üìä'},{path:'/profile',label:'Profile',icon:'üë§'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-brand",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-logo",children:"\uD83C\uDF7D\uFE0F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-title",children:"SmartMeal"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"nav-menu",children:navItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavLink,{to:item.path,className:_ref=>{let{isActive}=_ref;return"nav-link ".concat(isActive?'active':'');},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-icon",children:item.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-label",children:item.label})]})},item.path))})]})});};export default Navigation;
